text: لِّيَسْـَٔلَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ عَن صِدْقِهِمْ ۚ وَأَعَدَّ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

translation.en.sahih: That He may question the truthful about their truth. And He has prepared for the disbelievers a painful punishment.
translation.id.indonesian: agar Dia menanyakan kepada orang-orang yang benar tentang kebenaran mereka dan Dia menyediakan bagi orang-orang kafir siksa yang pedih.
